issues.title: System SSD at 84% capacity
issues.description: System SSD (/dev/nvme0n1) reached 84% capacity, triggering warnings in homelab-intel
issues.resolution: Pending: Need to clean journal logs, prune old containers, rotate backup logs

issues.title: Authelia SSO deployment complications
issues.description: Multiple attempts to deploy Authelia with YubiKey 2FA encountered config issues, Redis session storage problems
issues.resolution: Resolved: Created comprehensive configuration, separated Redis instance, validated MFA flow

issues.title: Immich dual-authentication user experience issue
issues.description: Immich requiring both Authelia SSO AND native login created poor UX for users
issues.resolution: Resolved: Removed Authelia middleware from Immich, use native auth only

issues.title: Drift detection script errexit failures
issues.description: check-drift.sh failing with 'bad substitution' errors due to errexit in arithmetic expansion
issues.resolution: Resolved: Refactored arithmetic to use (( )) instead of 0, added proper error handling

issues.title: Monitoring stack health checks intermittent
issues.description: Prometheus and Loki health endpoints timing out on initial checks, likely startup delays
issues.resolution: Workaround: Increased HealthStartPeriod in quadlets to 90s

issues.title: High swap usage indicating memory pressure
issues.description: Swap usage at 7.4GB (threshold 6.3GB), suggests containers may need memory limit tuning
issues.resolution: Investigation: Review container memory allocations, consider reducing Jellyfin from 4G to 3G

issues.title: Let's Encrypt certificate file not found warnings
issues.description: homelab-intel reporting certificate file missing, may be path issue or pre-issuance
issues.resolution: Investigation: Verify acme.json path and Let's Encrypt integration

issues.title: Jellyfin GPU transcoding not configured
issues.description: Jellyfin using CPU transcoding only, no VA-API hardware acceleration
issues.resolution: Resolved: Installed mesa-va-drivers-freeworld, added /dev/dri devices to quadlet, enabled VA-API in dashboard

issues.title: HDR/10-bit video color rendering incorrect on older TV
issues.description: HEVC 10-bit HDR content displays with wrong colors on 2016 Philips TV (no HDR support)
issues.resolution: Workaround: Disable HEVC 10-bit hardware decode, enable tone mapping in Jellyfin

issues.title: Multiple storage layout revisions needed
issues.description: Initial storage layout inadequate, required multiple revisions for BTRFS optimization
issues.resolution: Resolved: Created authoritative storage architecture with NOCOW for databases

issues.title: Intelligence script hanging on SSL checks
issues.description: homelab-intel.sh hanging indefinitely on certificate checks, blocking automation
issues.resolution: Resolved: Added timeout protection to curl commands, improved error handling

issues.title: Manual backup process error-prone
issues.description: Manual BTRFS snapshot process tedious, risk of forgetting backups
issues.resolution: Resolved: Created btrfs-snapshot-backup.sh with automated scheduling
